thread.title: Lamar Odom Paid $75K for 24-Hour Companionship at Brothel
thread.title_full: Lamar Odom Paid $75K for 24-Hour Companionship at Brothel

title: Lamar Odom Paid $75K for 24-Hour Companionship at Brothel
text: Privacy Policy | More Newsletters AP FILE - In this March 26, 2013, file photo, Los Angeles Clippers' Lamar Odom looks on from the court during an NBA basketball game in Dallas. Lamar Odom, who has been unresponsive since Tuesday after being found unconscious at the Love Ranch this week, paid $75,000 for round-the-clock companionship from two women, the brothel's owner told NBC News on Thursday. The five-day package included sex and activities like cooking, watching TV together and going out to dinner, known as the "girlfriend experience," the Love Ranch owner Dennis Hof said.
